summary: Project includes a landing page; user wants a specific image set as the landing page image.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Crop/resize to a wide hero and export as JPG (image-8.png > home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg)

existing_features.title: Ensure the landing-page hero image referenced by `frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx` at `/assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg` exists as a static asset in the frontend build output and loads successfully in the deployed app.
Update the hero image file content to use the newly uploaded image (`image-8.png`) while keeping the public URL path unchanged (`/assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg`).

new_feature_requests.summary: Set the provided image as the landing page image
Keep the existing landing-page hero image load-error fallback behavior in `frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx` so the page layout remains stable if the hero image fails to load.

projectName: Set uploaded image as landing page hero image
